definition: the five Liang of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Liang 前涼|前凉 (314-376), Later Liang 後涼|后凉 (386-403), Northern Liang 北涼|北凉 (398-439), Southern Liang 南涼|南凉 (397-414), Western Liang 西涼|西凉 (400-421)
flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: In some provinces, there is the tradition of eating cold noodles on this day.
sentences.chinese: 在一些省份，夏至有吃凉面的习俗。

sentences.english: The cold-noodle priced three point five always love me.
sentences.chinese: 三块五一碗的凉面也爱我。

sentences.english: Soba and ramen noodles are the daily lunch of many people in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 凉面和拉面是许多日本人的日常午餐。

sentences.english: I love the cold-noodle priced three point five in mess hall.
sentences.chinese: 我爱食堂三块五一碗的凉面。

definition: Sichuan noodles with a spicy and numbing sauce
noodles served with soy sauce/sesame butter etc
knife-shaved noodles (pared or shaved into strips), a Shanxi specialty
hot spicy soup (often sold in street stalls)
